text:
Looking back to this year, which was pretty tough mentally and physically, I’d like to say a big thank you. No, GIGANTIC thank you! To the HubSpot community and especially the HubSpot team.

Grateful for your constant support for <@UN7CEHC9X> and me during these dark times. Your kindness was one of those beams of light that helped us keep carrying on. Every opportunity you gave us kept the hope for a better future alive.

Thank you <@U2H3TT8F2> <@UD53A9UUR> <@U02094DEMTK> <@U7SL518D6>
Sorry for being slow with replies and overall communication. I wish I could contribute more to the community as I was planning back in January. Despite that, you still were there.

Thank you to the most amazing community :orange_heart: :thanku:

I am also thankful to the HubSpot community, the HubSpot team, and the amazing people I’ve had the pleasure of working with and getting to know. You have all been a source of inspiration and have given me the strength and motivation to keep going during a challenging year. I would also add to the list <@U0310AHEKMY> who has been incredibly supportive and encouraging.

And lastly, I would like to thank <@UMZFZHVUJ> for being such an incredible friend and partner.
You are both an inspiration.  Thank you!!
What an awesome message to wake up to you two! Thank you
To the HS team who saved me today… THANK YOU
